about_the_game:
Take part in the bow climb 30 by using your bow to climb up the platforms before the time limit ends.

The Bow Climb 30 is a grueling three-part endurance event that will test the limits of even the bravest adventurers. Participants will start by navigating a treacherous climb out of the depths of a cursed dungeon filled with danger and mystery. The second part of the challenge is a harrowing race through dense forests and rugged terrain, with a variety of obstacles to overcome. The final test will be a punishing ascent up a towering mountain peak, where the bravest competitors will face their greatest challenges yet. Only the strongest and most determined will have what it takes to escape the cursed dungeon and claim victory in this epic event.

Features

- A persistent multiplayer level
- Difficult to master gameplay
- A ever changing environment

name: Bow Climb

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (or Higher)
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard with at least 512MB

short_description: Join players from around the world in a gauntlet of challenges you and your bow must overcome. Bow climb is a social climbing game. It'll take time but you'll be able to do it!
